desc: The primary line of the RPC, which is displayed in the first line of the rich presence.
Enabling multiple lines will rotate through them.
The secondary line of the RPC, which is displayed in the second line of the rich presence.
Enabling multiple lines will rotate through them.

dynamic_priority.desc: The priority determines which line will be displayed when it exists. TODO

custom_text.desc: The text that gets displayed when "Custom Text" is selected as a line.

time_between_rotations.desc: The time in seconds between each rotation of the primary and secondary lines.

desc: The buttons that are displayed in the rich presence.
You can add up to two buttons; if more are added, it will take the first two.

logo.desc: The logo that is displayed in the rich presence.

desc: The Client ID used for the Discord Rich Presence.
<red>Don't change this unless you know what you're doing!</red>
Needs a restart to take effect.
